title: Houkago no Pleiades: Prism Palette
original_name: 放課後のプレアデス Prism Palette
sinopse: Subaru is a young girl who discovers that her best friend Aoi is part of magical group trying to gather engine fragments so that a little being from Pleiades star system can return to his home. Subaru considers joining them as she was chosen by the Pleiadian, president of this afterschool club.
